page.title: 19Recreation _ Football Teams
page.content: There are five sections to the football club.These comprise Under 11s.to Under 15s.Although the name is "Swinderby Football Club",players are drawn from outside the actual village. There are a small number of players however who do reside in Swinderby.The teams are organised by a residant of the village.The teams play in the "Kesteven League".Games are played both home and away,the home games being played on the football field in Station Road.The teams in the mid eighties are quite strong having reached the semi _ finals on a number of occasions.The Under 12s.in 1985 won many of their games reflecting their strength.
